snippet: As a director Ben Affleck has his third feature film, “Argo,” opening in October, and he says he is feeling more comfortable about being behind the camera while also acting in front of it.
abstract: Ben Affleck, who directs and stars in his third feature film Argo, says he feels more comfortable behind the camera than when he is acting in front of it.
lead_paragraph: As a director Ben Affleck has his third feature film, “Argo,” opening in October, and he says he is feeling more comfortable about being behind the camera while also acting in front of it.
